title: High Ping/Random Disconnects
body:
Recently in my League games I have had to dealt with high ping (100-500 ms)  and random "Attempting to reconnect" screens. I've tested my internet speed and it is fine (good at that) and I have closed all background programs. The lag only happens in League games.

Help?

replies.body: Your network is likely degrading to the point of total disconnection, and taht totally sucks.  Your internet speed can be good, but you can still find blocks or routing issues getting you over to us properly.  Try a DNS reconfigure and port forward in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  Test it in a custom game and let me know if it helps.
